attention.1: This is an unofficial site for Japanese translation by volunteers in Svelte Japan
attention.5: The content on this unofficial site may be out of date or incorrect.
attention.6: If you are looking for the official website, please visit

one.title: Write less code
one.content: Build boilerplate-free components using languages you already know — HTML, CSS and JavaScript

two.title: No virtual DOM
two.content: Svelte compiles your code to tiny, framework-less vanilla JS — your app starts fast and stays fast

three.title: Truly reactive
three.content: No more complex state management libraries — Svelte brings reactivity to JavaScript itself

p1.first: Svelte is a radical new approach to building user interfaces. Whereas traditional frameworks like React and Vue do the bulk of their work in the
p1.third: , Svelte shifts that work into a
p1.fifth: that happens when you build your app.

what.p2: Instead of using techniques like virtual DOM diffing, Svelte writes code that surgically updates the DOM when the state of your app changes.
